Comment: Wow, it’s impressive how some people just can’t seem to keep up with current events. 😏 But hey, at least the judge made the right call here. We need to ensure that democracy is upheld, especially when it comes to elections.   It's about time more folks recognize the importance of certifying results, especially when they're leaning toward the right side of history. Can't say the same for the Republicans, who'd probably prefer a system where they can just declare themselves winners. But, you know, that's just how they roll. 🙄
